msg: Small fixes to the wc_db pristine implementation.

author: jwhitlock
msg: Integrate ctypes-python into the Subversion build infrastructure.
* configure.ac: Updated to check for ctypesgen.
* Makefile.in (local-extraclean, local-clean): Updated prerequisites to clean
(build_functions_py): Use new variable pointing to ctypesgen.py.
* subversion/bindings/ctypes-python/TODO: Removed the two items this commit
takes care of and add a new item for getting the ctypes-python to build

author: hwright
msg: Punt on the issues of duplicate representations in the same revision or in
parallel transactions.  There may be ways to deal with these issues, but
this allows us to get most of the benefits with minimal complexity.
(write_final_rev): If a previous representation exists, don't error when
(svn_fs_fs__set_rep_reference): Conditionally error on a duplicate rep.

author: hwright
msg: Handle the simple case of shared reps.  This does NOT handle these cases:
* Two files in the same revision with the same contents.
* Two files in parallel commits with the same contents.
(rep_write_contents_close): Check for an existing rep with the same checksum
as the just-closed rep.  If one exists, remove the just-written rep.
